stimulusHtml: Scholars believe that the vessel was most likely used in a ritual context for which of the following reasons?

features.html: Â© RMN-Grand Palais / Art Resource, NY

choicesHtml: It was discovered inside a cave, alongside votive figurines.
It was found in the ruins of an ancestral shrine.
It was deposited in a sacred well associated with a fertility goddess.
It was buried in a cemetery, underneath an artificial mound.
